In England, in the seven days to 18 March, there were 31,782 new confirmed cases (56.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 March, there were 33,056 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 4% (1,274 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 March is 3,768,609 (6,695.3 cases per 100,000 population).
